notes.title: Author contributions
notes.p: S.T., G.C.A., H.Z., and P.Z. contributed to the initial concept development, discussion, and experimental design. S.T. and G.C.A. carried out material synthesis and characterization. A.G. performed the XRD measurements. All authors contributed to the analysis of the results and writing of the manuscript. P.Z. supervised the studies performed in the manuscript.
